jobs.title: Senior Backend Engineer
jobs.content: We are looking for a Senior Backend Engineer to join our platform team. You will build and maintain scalable microservices using Python and FastAPI, design data pipelines, and work with PostgreSQL and Redis. Requirements: 4+ years Python experience, strong SQL skills, experience with cloud infrastructure (AWS preferred). Nice to have: ML/AI experience, TypeScript, React.

jobs.title: Platform Engineer
jobs.content: Build and maintain our cloud infrastructure platform. Work with Kubernetes, Terraform, and AWS to support engineering teams. Requirements: 3+ years experience with cloud platforms, Python or Go, Docker and Kubernetes.
